song_lyrics: He jī me to harkhe nihaḷyā Nāth,
Āj maher karī māre māth... he jī 1
Bhavnā badhan badhā chhuṭi gayā ne,
Dag re bharu hu to Swāmī sangāthe;
Āj pāmyo alaukik sāth... he jī 2
Ghaṇu re jīvo mārā Pramukhjī prītam;
title: He jī me to harkhe nihaḷyā Nāth

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-199: Indrajit Chaudhari

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
